root: ^I can't believe it... My creation is alive!

g-0: ^Yes! I am your creator! You were my very best.
g-1: ^You've been out of service for many years. I'm not quite sure why you've awakened. But that's not important, you need to help me!
g-2: ^I've been taken captive by another one of my creations. One like you but...
g-3: ^While you were a success in most aspects... This one was not. They are sadistic. You have to help me.
g-4: ^The Tower. Where the drones are created. He's taken me here as a trophy. I'm afraid I'll be here until I'm dead if you don't help.
g-5: ^I can help with that! Check the junk piles near you. Search them and you might find some memory sticks. There will be more on the way to The Tower.
